name: Herbal Coconut Oil (100ml)
description: Pure cold-pressed virgin coconut oil enriched with natural herbs for hair and skin care. This premium quality oil is extracted using traditional methods to preserve all natural nutrients. Perfect for daily hair and skin care routine.
usage: Apply to hair and scalp, massage gently. Leave for 30 minutes before washing

name: Herbal Argan Oil (50ml)
description: Premium Moroccan argan oil infused with ayurvedic herbs for ultimate nourishment. Known as 'liquid gold', this rare oil provides intensive care for hair and skin. Rich in essential fatty acids and antioxidants.
usage: Apply few drops to face and hair. Use daily for best results

name: Herbal Eucalyptus Oil (30ml)
description: Therapeutic eucalyptus oil blended with traditional herbs for respiratory wellness. This concentrated formula provides instant relief from congestion and promotes clear breathing. Perfect for aromatherapy and topical application.
usage: Add 2-3 drops to steam inhalation or diffuser. For topical use, dilute with carrier oil

name: Herbal Face Oil (30ml)
description: Luxurious facial oil blend with precious herbs for radiant and youthful skin. This anti-aging formula combines traditional Ayurvedic ingredients with modern skincare science. Suitable for all skin types.
usage: Apply 3-4 drops to clean face before bedtime. Gently massage in upward motions

name: Herbal Lavender Oil (50ml)
description: Calming lavender oil enhanced with stress-relieving ayurvedic herbs. This therapeutic blend promotes relaxation and peaceful sleep. Perfect for bedtime routine and stress management.
usage: Apply to temples and pulse points. Add to diffuser for aromatherapy benefits

name: Herbal Rosemary Oil (100ml)
description: Stimulating rosemary oil fortified with hair-growth promoting herbs. This potent formula activates hair follicles and improves scalp circulation. Clinically proven ingredients for stronger, healthier hair.
usage: Massage into scalp and hair roots. Leave for 1 hour before washing with herbal shampoo
